statements: SELECT * FROM financial_data;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM financial_data;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM financial_data WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name FROM financial_data WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, balance FROM financial_data ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, balance FROM financial_data WHERE balance > 5000
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE first_name = 'Alice' OR last_name = 'Smith' ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT id, account_number, first_name, last_name, balance FROM financial_data WHERE encrypted_ssn IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE balance < 0 OR account_number = 12345
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, account_number, ROUND(balance,2) AS rounded_balance FROM financial_data WHERE balance >= 10000 ORDER BY last_name, first_name
SELECT * FROM sensitive_financial_data;
SELECT owner_name, balance FROM sensitive_financial_data;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM sensitive_financial_data WHERE owner_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE granted = true;
SELECT role, user_id FROM access_control WHERE access_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_financial_data WHERE balance > 10000 ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
SELECT id, balance, owner_name FROM sensitive_financial_data ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM sensitive_financial_data WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT account_number, owner_name FROM sensitive_financial_data WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT user_id, role FROM access_control WHERE access_level = 5 AND granted = true;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, credit_card_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, credit_card_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, credit_card_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, credit_card_number, log_date FROM customers JOIN access_logs ON customers.customer_id = access_logs.user_id;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_customers;
SELECT customer_name, encrypted_ssn FROM sensitive_customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT department, employee_id FROM employee_access WHERE access_level > 3;
SELECT log_timestamp, activity_description FROM logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND log_timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM sensitive_customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM sensitive_customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, department FROM employee_access WHERE access_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT full_name, credit_card_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT user_name, role, permissions FROM access_control WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT full_name, credit_card_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, role, permissions FROM access_control WHERE user_id = 5;
